welcome.title: TW Values
welcome.content: TW Values is a political quiz for taiwanese.

q0000.description: It is necessary for the government to intervene in the economy to protect consumers.

q0001.description: Taxes should be increased on the rich to provide for the poor.

q0002.description: Basic utilities like roads and electricity should be publicly owned.

q0003.description: Quality education is a right of all people.

q0004.description: Taxes should be rapidly increased on multiple property owners.

q0100.description: For the sake of economic growth, sacrifice of labor rights is acceptable.

q0101.description: Inheritance is a legitimate form of wealth.

q0102.description: Government intervention is a threat to the economy.

q0103.description: Those with a greater ability to pay should receive better healthcare.

q0104.description: Whoever invented unpaid leave should get a Nobel Prize.

q0200.description: Climate change is currently one of the greatest threats to our way of life.

q0201.description: It is acceptable to increase the cost of living in pursuit of environmental protection.

q0202.description: The extinction of species due to human actions is unacceptable.

q0203.description: The development of renewable energy is most important.

q0300.description: It is acceptable to have environmental pollution in pursuit of economic growth.

q0301.description: The use of cheap  fossil fuels is necessary.

q0302.description: There should not be any quotas on fishing.

q0401.description: The very existence of the state is a threat to our liberty.

q0402.description: Protest marches should not require prior application.

q0403.description: It is important that the government follows the majority opinion, even if it is wrong.

q0404.description: Political leaders should be able to be satirized or vilified in artistic works.

q0405.description: Drug use should be legalized or decriminalized.

q0500.description: The general populace makes poor decisions.

q0501.description: Government surveillance is necessary in the modern world.

q0502.description: The sacrifice of some civil liberties is necessary to protect us from acts of terrorism.

q0503.description: The stronger the leadership, the better.

q0504.description: Even when protesting an authoritarian government, violence is not acceptable.

q0505.description: It is important to maintain law and order.

q0600.description: We should believe in modern medicine and despise traditional medicine.

q0601.description: Churches should be taxed the same way other institutions are taxed.

q0604.description: Governments should be as concerned about foreigners as they are about their own citizens.

q0700.description: Society was better many years ago than it is now.

q0701.description: It is important that we maintain the traditions of our past.

q0703.description: Abortion should be prohibited in most or all cases.

q0705.description:
Young and beautiful girls, suitable for counter staff. 
It is scary for women to go out on the street without makeup.
Too many unmarried women are a national security concern.

q1000.description: Our country is already a sovereign and independent country.

q1001.description: A constitution for 'Republic of Taiwan' should be enacted immediately.

q1002.description: Military spending is essential to protect our country.

q1100.description: Taiwan is a province of 'People's Republic of China (PRC)'.

q1101.description: 'Republic of China (R.O.C)' is the sole legitimate government of China.

q1102.description: Use 'Chinese Taipei' to participate in international events is acceptable.

q1103.description: Political negotiations with PRC should be carried out immediately to achieve national unity.

q1200.description: We should stand with U.S. against China.

q1201.description: A referendum should be held immediately to join the U.S. as the 51st state of them.

q1301.description: We should restart talks on cross-strait service trade Agreement as soon as possible.

q1302.description: We should sign Cross-strait peace agreement as soon as possible.

q1303.description: It is better to keep peaceful relationship with China to avoid World War III.
